title: Trump calls Kirk’s killer a ‘total animal’
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says Charlie Kirk’s killer is a "total animal" and hopes authorities will catch him soon.

title: Trump administration warns foreigners praising Charlie Kirk's killing
shortDescription: Deputy Secretary of State Christopher Landau warned foreign nationals who praise the killing of Charlie Kirk that they are not welcome in the U.S.

title: ‘We have to stop it.’ Dems try to lower temperature amid Kirk murder.
shortDescription: Democrats seek to ease tensions while continuing to steadfastly oppose President Donald Trump's political agenda.

title: Political violence hits both sides. Trump reacts to Kirk and Hortman
shortDescription: President Donald Trump blamed the 'radical left' for Charlie Kirk's death. Democratic lawaker Melissa Hortman was also killed. What did Trump say?

title: Kirk shooting kicks up questions and comparisons to Trump being shot
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was shot in the ear at a campaign event in July 2024. After Charlie Kirk was shot and killed, conspiracy theories are booming.

title: Charlie Kirk monument in the US Capitol? Republicans want one.
shortDescription: Congressional Republicans want to build a statue of the late conservative activist Charlie Kirk in the U.S. Capitol.

title: Trump to give Charlie Kirk Medal of Freedom
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announces posthumous Presidential Medal of Freedom for Charlie Kirk.

title: Former Brevard Schools member announces U.S. Senate run
shortDescription: Former Brevard County School Board Member Jennifer Jenkins has announced that she will run for the U.S. Senate. Jenkins will face U.S. Sen. Ashley Moody in the general election.

title: Charlie Kirk death sparks shouting match on House floor
shortDescription: Lawmakers erupted into a shouting match on the House floor shortly after a moment of silence was held for conservative commentator Charlie Kirk.

title: Trump to award Charlie Kirk the Presidential Medal of Freedom
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will award Charlie Kirk posthumously the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
